creator: belt-steinwenden

content:
One can usually set up Thunderbird to look and act as they want it too while getting the benefits of more recent versions. What about the new “format” do you not like?

What do you mean that you crashed the hard drive and had to re-boot a new Windows?

If your old hard drive is unusable, probably all you can do is hire a data recovery service to salvage files that are salvageable. No guarantee that your local folders are salvageable.

Unless you backed up your data?
creator: mozilla98

content:
You want to send e-mail to someone who uses Thunderbird?

Oh, you want to text chat with someone through Thunderbird?

I am sorry that I do not know anything about the chat function. Let us hope that someone else helps.
creator: mozilla98

content: You have activated the Quick Filter button "Unread" (Show only unread messages). Disable the "Unread" button by a click on it or disable the Quick Filter by a click on its symbol in the toolbar
creator: Mapenzi

content: Thunderbird is only an email client, incapable of blocking or unblocking a domain. I encourage you to work with either your domain registrar or your web host to resolve your issue.
creator: davidsk

content: Gelen posta sunucunuzun ayarları hatalı olabilir. E-posta hizmeti aldığınız firmadan doğru ayarları öğrenerek Thunderbird'deki ayarlarla karşılaştırabilirsiniz.
creator: maxcoder
